name: The Tasks of Messengers and Guardians - Concept Demo
name_original: The Tasks of Messengers and Guardians - Concept Demo
description:
[Alpha chapter for the Tasks of Messengers and Guardians,  currently in development, in order to showcase the art style, concept, etc. ]

Valemira Levin, the former princess of the superpower Armegadierre, receives an invitation to return to the capital after ten years in exile. But the bringer of good news, her cousin Phillip, doesn't merely want her to return, but rather to take the throne from her stepmother, the Queen Regent Lufena.

Meanwhile, the true protagonist has yet to take the stage.

[This project is planned to be a novel-length story, released in segmented iterations. Feedback is always appreciated! Progress will be updated on a weekly basis. ]
